thread.title: We're selling the rebound, says GuideStone Capital's David Spika

title: We're selling the rebound, says GuideStone Capital's David Spika
text:
We're selling the rebound, says GuideStone Capital's David Spika   02:53 
While last year we were constantly buying the dip, this year we're selling the rebound, says David Spika, president of GuideStone Capital. He adds there is no trade war with China just yet. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
